body.p: at Cairo yesterday. Col Oglesby the Commander had released our Citizens before my arrival says he did not intend to violate Kentucky Neutrality & will not without orders some times send squad of men over to Kentucky shore to reconnoitre for his own protection. Will not release Steamer Ferry says she is ^a^ lawful prize she is owned in Kentucky & Mississippi was a trader from paducah up Tennessee river into the Confedarte states Col oglesby & other officers treated me very courteously
